metadata.title: CVE-2024-35815 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/aio: Check IOCB_AIO_RW before the struct aio_kiocb conversionThe first kiocb_set_cancel_fn() argument may point at a struct kiocbthat is not embedded inside struct aio_kiocb. With the current code,depending on the compiler, the req->ki_ctx read happens either beforethe IOCB_AIO_RW test or after that test. Move the req->ki_ctx read suchthat it is guaranteed that the IOCB_AIO_RW test happens first.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
